node.detail_zh: 患者為 #143 患者的私人司機。與太太及子女居於鑽石山龍蟠苑龍珠閣，未有外遊。他曾於 3 月 11 日接 #143 患者返家， 3 月 12 日接他去 #154 患者的大圍居所取文件。他與 #143 患者有長時間接觸，此外其他時間多數在車上或家中，只曾於 3 月 13 日及 3 月 14 日於華明邨麥當勞逗留，以及在新蒲崗 Mikiki 為座駕充電。
node.detail_en: The patient is the designated driver for patient no 143, and he lives in Lung Chu House, Lung Poon Court with his wife and son and daughter.  He has no travel history.   He drove the patient no 143 back home on Mar 11, and he picked up patient no 143 on Mar 12 to the home of patient 154 in Tai Wai to pick up some document. He has long hours of exposure with patient case 143, for other time he was either home or in the car.   He stayed in Wah Ming Estate McDonald's during Mar 13 and Mar 14 for a short while, and charged for his car in Mikiki.
node.classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Lung Chu House, Lung Poon Court
node.remarks_zh: 患者是第 143 宗個案病人的司機。過往健康良好
node.remarks_en: Patient is the driver of the patient no 143, he has good past health.

node.location_en: Lai Ming House, Wah Ming Estate

node.location_zh: 花都廣場地下 91A, 93-95 號舖麥當勞
node.location_en: McDonald's, Flora Plaza, 88 Pak Wo Road
node.remarks_zh: 曾於於華明邨麥當勞逗留
接載僱主到第 153 宗個案病人的家取文件
node.remarks_en: Drove employer to patient no 153's home to collect document.

node.location_en: Lai Ming House, Wah Ming Estate
node.remarks_zh: 接載第 143 宗個案返家
node.remarks_en: Pick up patient no 143 and drove him home

node.remarks_zh: 3 月 15 日感到發燒，進行密切接觸者追蹤工作時安排入院，其呼吸道樣本 3 月 16 日證實對病毒呈陽性反應
node.remarks_en: Dad subjective fever on Mar 15 and was admitted to hospital for treatment during contact tracing by CHP on the same day. His respiratory sample was tested positive for coronavirus on Mar 16.
